DataElement.preferredDefinition: The type of substance or portion of material obtained for use in the computational analysis performed to determine the similarities between nonidentical proteins or molecules of DNA or RNA.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The determination of the sequence of component residues in a macromolecule, e.g. amino acids in a protein or nucleotide bases in DNA/RNA or the computational analysis performed to determine the similarities between nonidentical proteins or molecules of DNA or RNA._Anything added into a sytem._A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The determination of the sequence of component residues in a macromolecule, e.g. amino acids in a protein or nucleotide bases in DNA/RNA or the computational analysis performed to determine the similarities between nonidentical proteins or molecules of DNA or RNA.

Concepts.definition: The determination of the sequence of component residues in a macromolecule, e.g. amino acids in a protein or nucleotide bases in DNA/RNA or the computational analysis performed to determine the similarities between nonidentical proteins or molecules of DNA or RNA.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: attributes of a patient's laboratory sample, including the source, condition, and fixative.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The deposition of an RNA sample into a collection tube as a result of an RNA extraction procedure.

Concepts.definition: The deposition of an RNA sample into a collection tube as a result of an RNA extraction procedure.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The deposition of a tissue sample into a micro-tube or the well of a micro-well plate as a result of a tissue dissection procedure.

Concepts.definition: The deposition of a tissue sample into a micro-tube or the well of a micro-well plate as a result of a tissue dissection procedure.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The deposition of a tissue sample onto a plastic surface as a result of a tissue dissection procedure.

Concepts.definition: The deposition of a tissue sample onto a plastic surface as a result of a tissue dissection procedure.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: A practiced and regimented skill or series of actions.
